conclusion: Analyze the image to understand the flow path of liquid through the baffles.
Identify the connections between the containers and the baffles.
The image shows containers labeled E, F, and G at the bottom and baffles labeled A, B, C, and D at the top with arrows indicating flow direction.
Liquid will flow from A to E, from B to F, and from C to G based on arrows.
Liquid from A flows into E, from B into F, and from C into G.
Liquid from A, B, and C will flow into E, F, and G respectively.
Based on connections, liquid will flow into E from A, into F from B, and into G from C.
